titleStmt.title: Chrysanaleia: the golden fishing: or Honour of fishmongers Applauding the aduancement of Mr. Iohn Leman, alderman, to the dignitie of Lord Maior of London. Taking his oath in the same authority at Westminster, on Tuesday, being the 29. day of October. 1616. Performed in hearty loue to him, and at the charges of his worthy brethren, the ancient, and right Worshipfull Company of Fishmongers. Deuised and written by A.M. citizen and draper of London.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

titleStmt.title: Chrysanaleia: the golden fishing: or Honour of fishmongers Applauding the aduancement of Mr. Iohn Leman, alderman, to the dignitie of Lord Maior of London. Taking his oath in the same authority at Westminster, on Tuesday, being the 29. day of October. 1616. Performed in hearty loue to him, and at the charges of his worthy brethren, the ancient, and right Worshipfull Company of Fishmongers. Deuised and written by A.M. citizen and draper of London.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The golden fishing.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
